abstract: With the purchase of 24/7 Real Media, WPP Group‘s chief executive, Martin Sorrell, who called Google a “frenemy” last fall, is hoping to become a frenemy himself.
lead_paragraph: With the purchase of 24/7 Real Media, WPP Group‘s chief executive, Martin Sorrell, who called Google a “frenemy” last fall, is hoping to become a frenemy himself.

headline.main: The 24/7 Real Media Sale: A Story of ‘Frenemies’
